forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
